abstract: At a meeting this week, the Fed is likely to weigh the merits of resuming large-scale purchases of Treasury securities to push interest rates even lower.
snippet: At a meeting this week, the Fed is likely to weigh the merits of resuming large-scale purchases of Treasury securities to push interest rates even lower.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  With tax rates at the center of the debate over how to revive the stalled recovery, the Federal Reserve is likely to spend its policy meeting on Tuesday weighing the merits of additional steps to stimulate the economy, while deferring some major decisions until later this year.

headline.main: Fed Expected to Weigh More Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Fed Is Expected to Discuss More Ways to Revive Economy

abstract: The U.S. stock market hits a four-month high on hopes for a decent economic recovery.
snippet: The U.S. stock market hits a four-month high on hopes for a decent economic recovery.
lead_paragraph: The American stock market moved to a four-month high Monday. The S.&P. 500-stock index closed at 1,142.71. That is the highest level since May 13, just before the summer round of economic pessimism and dismay began to take root.
